18.40 Lakh On road price, Delhi Delhi Starting 13,193 /month EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. Heres how the $23,490 (drive-away) Mahindra XUV 3XO is delivering premium features for (a lot) less, from full ADAS safety to twin 10.25-inch digital displays and space like a larger SUV. Sponsored by Mahindra Drive Brand Studios 16:00 24 July 2025 0 comments + 12 Photos Not that long ago, if you wanted a top-spec SUV loaded with all the bells and whistles, you had to prime the credit card because it was going to cost you. A lot. But a new compact SUV is challenging for the title of best value SUV in Australia in 2025, catching the eye of Aussie bargain hunters, and over-50s looking to downsize,with a list of goodies like a car costing $10,000 more. From just $23,490 drive-away (and under four metres long), the new Mahindra XUV 3XO also comes with a glass opening sunroof, a seven-year warranty, an Advanced Driver Assistance System (ADAS) and wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto and thats just the start. This budget SUV with premium features is shaking up its segment in multiple ways. In the case of the top-spec, $26,490 drive-away Mahindra XUV 3XO AX7L , you can add to the above equipment a full panoramic glass roof (with opening sunroof portion), dual 10.25-inch digital displays, 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels, Harmon Kardon stereo system (a supplier to BMW, Mercedes-Benz and Volvo), fresh exterior styling, delightful interior finishes, and more. If its a new SUV leaving you wanting for nothing with every modern convenience for the lowest possible price look no further. Mahindra has been in Australia for nearly 20 years and has more than 70 dealers across the country. In this article, we explore its XUV 3XOs value proposition against competitors, its comfort and practicality, and the ways this compact SUV outshines pricier rivals on efficiency, tech and cabin space. + 12 Photos + 12 Photos + 12 Photos Previous Next Does the Mahindra XUV 3XO come with ADAS? All XUV 3XO models come with a full Advanced Driver Assistance System (ADAS) offering a long list of active safety features such as Autonomous Emergency Braking (AEB) with pedestrian and cyclist detection, Active Lane Keeping, Lane Departure Warning, Traffic Sign Recognition and Forward Collision Warning. 18.40 Lakh On road price, Delhi Delhi Starting 13,193 /month EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. Heres how the $23,490 (drive-away) Mahindra XUV 3XO is delivering premium features for (a lot) less, from full ADAS safety to twin 10.25-inch digital displays and space like a larger SUV. Sponsored by Mahindra Drive Brand Studios 16:00 24 July 2025 0 comments + 12 Photos Not that long ago, if you wanted a top-spec SUV loaded with all the bells and whistles, you had to prime the credit card because it was going to cost you. A lot. But a new compact SUV is challenging for the title of best value SUV in Australia in 2025, catching the eye of Aussie bargain hunters, and over-50s looking to downsize,with a list of goodies like a car costing $10,000 more. From just $23,490 drive-away (and under four metres long), the new Mahindra XUV 3XO also comes with a glass opening sunroof, a seven-year warranty, an Advanced Driver Assistance System (ADAS) and wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto and thats just the start. This budget SUV with premium features is shaking up its segment in multiple ways. In the case of the top-spec, $26,490 drive-away Mahindra XUV 3XO AX7L , you can add to the above equipment a full panoramic glass roof (with opening sunroof portion), dual 10.25-inch digital displays, 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels, Harmon Kardon stereo system (a supplier to BMW, Mercedes-Benz and Volvo), fresh exterior styling, delightful interior finishes, and more. If its a new SUV leaving you wanting for nothing with every modern convenience for the lowest possible price look no further. Mahindra has been in Australia for nearly 20 years and has more than 70 dealers across the country. In this article, we explore its XUV 3XOs value proposition against competitors, its comfort and practicality, and the ways this compact SUV outshines pricier rivals on efficiency, tech and cabin space. + 12 Photos + 12 Photos + 12 Photos Previous Next Does the Mahindra XUV 3XO come with ADAS? All XUV 3XO models come with a full Advanced Driver Assistance System (ADAS) offering a long list of active safety features such as Autonomous Emergency Braking (AEB) with pedestrian and cyclist detection, Active Lane Keeping, Lane Departure Warning, Traffic Sign Recognition and Forward Collision Warning. With Adaptive Cruise Control and active lane keeping, the XUV 3XO is also equipped as standard with Level 2 semi-autonomous driving capability. News Latest Cars Latest Bikes Scooters Comparisons Auto Finance News Latest Cars Latest Bikes Scooters Comparisons Auto Finance Facebook Twitter Youtube Instagram Latest Cars Mahindra XUV 3XO: The Game-Changer SUV You Cant Ignore in 2025 June 1, 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO: If youre on the hunt for a stylish, tech-packed, and safety-first compact SUV, the Mahindra XUV 3XO (formerly known as the XUV300) deserves your attention. Launched in 2024, this refreshed model brings a bold design, advanced features, and impressive performance to the tableall while keeping your budget in mind. Lets take a closer look at what makes the XUV 3XO a standout choice in its segment. Table of Contents Toggle Mahindra XUV 3XO Launch Date Mahindra XUV 3XO Design and Build Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine and Mileage Mahindra XUV 3XO Features and Technology Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior Mahindra XUV 3XO Safety Features Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications Table Mahindra XUV 3XO On-Road Price FAQs Mahindra XUV 3XO Launch Date Mahindra officially launched the XUV 3XO in April 2024, marking a significant update to its predecessor, the XUV300. This new model isnt just a facelift; its a comprehensive overhaul that introduces a fresh design, enhanced features, and improved performance. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Mahindra XUV 3XO (@mahindraxuv3xo) Since its debut, the XUV 3XO has garnered attention for its value-packed offerings, positioning itself as a strong contender in the compact SUV market. With a range of variants and features, it caters to a wide audience looking for a blend of style, comfort, and technology. Also Read Mahindra XUV 3XO Design and Build The XUV 3XO sports a bold and athletic design that commands attention on the road. Its front grille with piano black finish, sleek LED headlamps, and infinity LED tail lamps contribute to its modern and aggressive look. The SUVs stance is further enhanced by R17 diamond-cut alloy wheels, giving it a premium feel. Built on a robust platform, the XUV 3XO offers a ground clearance of 201mm, ensuring it can handle various terrains with ease. Its dimensions3990mm in length, 1821mm in width, and a wheelbase of 2600mmprovide a spacious cabin while maintaining maneuverability in urban settings. Mahindra XUV 3XO Engine and Mileage Under the hood, the XUV 3XO offers multiple engine options to suit different driving preferences. The petrol variant features a 1.2L Turbocharged engine delivering 82 kW @ 5000 rpm and 200 Nm of torque @ 1500-3500 rpm. For those seeking more power, the TGDi engine variant offers 96 kW @ 5000 rpm and 230 Nm of torque @ 1500-3750 rpm. On the diesel front, the 1.5L engine produces 85.8 kW @ 3750 rpm and 300 Nm of torque @ 1500-2500 rpm. These engines are paired with either a 6-speed manual or a 6-speed automatic transmission, providing flexibility for different driving styles. The XUV 3XO also offers three drive modesZip, Zap, and Zoomto tailor the driving experience. Mahindra XUV 3XO Features and Technology The XUV 3XO is packed with features that enhance both convenience and entertainment. It boasts a 10.25-inch touchscreen infotainment system with navigation, Apple CarPlay, and Android Auto compatibility. The Harman Kardon audio system with 7 speakers ensures an immersive sound experience. Additional tech-savvy features include a wireless charger, 65W USB-C fast charging, and a digital instrument cluster. The SUV also offers connected car technology, allowing remote access to various functions and real-time vehicle information. Also Read Mahindra XUV 3XO Interior Step inside the XUV 3XO, and youre greeted with a cabin that exudes comfort and sophistication. The interior features premium leatherette seats, soft-touch materials on the dashboard and door trims, and a cooled glovebox with illumination.
